content: these socks are inspired by the beauty of cherry blossoms i needed some time to write down my idea of the socks and finally did it when my friend riccarda told me she had spend some time in japan and also loves cherry blossoms the socks are worked cuff-down after some row of ribbing you start with stranded colorwork the heel is knitted with ribbing and slipped stitches and the gusset is on the sole **i am a left handed knitter so this pattern includes left and right handed charts be careful to pick the right chart for your style of knitting ssk and k2tog are used like right handed knitters use them k2tog has to be a right-leaning decrease ssk a left-leaning decrease ** **supplies** two colors of sock yarn fingering weight 100 g 365 m main color 50 g 180 m contrast color 2 00 mm needles for the cuffs 2 5 mm needles or size needed to obtain the right size like explained in the sizing section stitch markers 40 beads yarn needle **gauge and sizing** for size s 7 5 /19 cm circumference 38 stitches and 42 row = 4 x 4 / 10 x 10 cm in stranded colorwork pattern for size m 8 5 /21 5 cm circumference 34 stitches and 40 row = 4 x 4 / 10 x 10 cm in stranded colorwork pattern
